mention.text: two experiments : one which ignored word-sense distinctions , resulting in 6.3 % accuracy for semantic classification of verbs based on -LRB- Levin , 1993 -RRB- ; and one which exploited word-sense distinctions , resulting in 97.9 % accuracy
